content.original: Actuators control a 'Mech's limbs and are used to perform Melee attacks at close quarters. All 'Mechs come equipped with stock Actuators, which can be upgraded for improved performance. MELEE HAND ACTUATOR. Disables Arm Mounted Weapon Bonus.
content.prevOriginal: Actuators control a 'Mech's limbs and are used to perform Melee attacks at close quarters. All 'Mechs come equipped with stock Actuators, which can be upgraded for improved performance. MELEE HAND ACTUATOR. Disables Arm Mounted Weapon Bonus.

content.original: Weapon Actuators are a collection of specialized Servos and Compensators allowing a BattleMech's Arm mounted Weapons to Fire with greater Accuracy. WEAPON LOWER ARM ACTUATOR. Reduces Melee, Improves Arm Mounted Weapons.

content.original: Industrial mechs use arm-mounted Cargo Grips to shift crates, construction materials and other large, heavy objects. Though lacking the speed and precision of a military hand actuator their wide and secure grasp can prove useful in melee grappling, even lifting smaller mechs clean off the ground.
content.prevOriginal: Industrial mechs use arm-mounted Cargo Grips to shift crates, construction materials and other large, heavy objects. Though lacking the speed and precision of a military hand actuator their wide and secure grasp can prove useful in melee grappling, even lifting smaller mechs clean off the ground.
content.content: Industrial mechs use arm-mounted Cargo Grips to shift crates, construction materials and other large, heavy objects. Though lacking the speed and precision of a military hand actuator their wide and secure grasp can prove useful in melee grappling, even lifting smaller mechs clean off the ground.

content.original: Industrial mechs use arm-mounted Excavator Claws to dig, scoop and crush soil or loose aggregate. Though lacking the speed and precision of military hand actuators these can exert prodigious force in melee combat.
content.prevOriginal: Industrial mechs use arm-mounted Excavator Claws to dig, scoop and crush soil or loose aggregate. Though lacking the speed and precision of military hand actuators these can exert prodigious force in melee combat.
content.content: Industrial mechs use arm-mounted Excavator Claws to dig, scoop and crush soil or loose aggregate. Though lacking the speed and precision of military hand actuators these can exert prodigious force in melee combat.

content.original: A Retractable Blade, giving a 'Edge' in any Melee Encounter. Requires a Hand Actuator to be installed in same Location.
content.prevOriginal: A Retractable Blade, giving a 'Edge' in any Melee Encounter. Requires a Hand Actuator to be installed in same Location.
content.content: A Retractable Blade, giving a 'Edge' in any Melee Encounter. Requires a Hand Actuator to be installed in same Location.

content.original: A BattleMech Claw is a melee weapon most frequently used in the arena fighting on Solaris. The Claw consists of a series of hardened steel blades mounted on reinforced tungsten frames. MELEE HAND ACTUATOR. Disables Arm Mounted Weapon Bonus.

content.original: This rare specialized set of Leg actuators enhance all Melee and DFA actions, why the engineer chose to mold them like the talons of a Bird of Prey is open to discussion.
